eventSummary: Hackers stole data from SitusAMC, which is used by 1,500 clients including JPMorgan Chase and Citi for real-estate loans and mortgages. This incident has prompted efforts to determine the extent of the data stolen and which banks are affected.Sources:- http://buff.ly/1RA3X4C- https://bsky.app/profile/alexisrjimenez.bsky.social/post/3m6fmj4bzcq2g

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: Harvard University disclosed that its Alumni Affairs and Development systems were compromised in a voice phishing attack, exposing personal information of students, alumni, donors, staff, and faculty members.Sources:- https://bsky.app/profile/bleepingcomputer.com/post/3m6eyqiouw625- www.bleepingcomputer.com

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: A user reported a fraud transaction on their UOB PPV card for an Amazon UAE purchase, indicating a BIN attack that UOB CSO confirmed has been happening recently. The user has blocked the card and requested a replacement.Sources:- https://t.me/HoneyMoneySG
